headline: Verizon to report earnings July 21, 2025
summary: NEW YORK, July 17, 2025 (GLOBE NEWSWIRE) -- Verizon Communications Inc. (NYSE, Nasdaq: VZ) will report second-quarter 2025 earnings on Monday, July 21, 2025. The company will present results on a webcast beginning at 8:30 a.m. Eastern Time. Second-quarter 2025 materials will be available at 7:00 a.m. ET on Verizon’s Investor Relations website, https://www.verizon.com/about/investors. These materials will include: Detailed information on Verizon's second quarter results;Verizon's earnings news re

headline: SquareX Collaborates with Top Fortune 500 CISOs to Launch The Browser Security Field Manual at Black Hat
summary: SquareX announced the official launch of The Browser Security Field Manual at Black Hat USA 2025. In addition to a comprehensive practical guide to the latest TTPs attackers are using to target employees in the browser, this comprehensive manual features industry perspectives from leading CISOs from multiple Fortune 500 enterprises and other iconic companies, who share their perspectives on the evolving browser security landscape, the importance of each threat vector, and how they expect these a

headline: Stellar Cyber Delivers Built-In Identity Threat Detection & Response (ITDR) to Combat Credential-Based Attacks in Real Time
summary: SAN JOSE, Calif., July 17, 2025--Stellar Cyber, the security illumination company, today announced the advanced development of its Identity Threat Detection & Response (ITDR) capabilities, fully embedded into its open, unified, AI-driven SecOps platform. ITDR marks a critical step forward on the journey to a human-augmented autonomous SOC, empowering security teams with identity-centric visibility and control—without requiring yet another tool or console.

headline: Contrast Security Releases Software Under Siege 2025, Exposing What Traditional Reports Miss About Application-Layer Threats
summary: PLEASANTON, Calif., July 17, 2025--Contrast Security, the global leader in Application Detection and Response (ADR), today released Software Under Siege 2025: The Contrast Application Threat Report, exposing the growing crisis at the application layer as adversaries use AI to easily launch previously sophisticated attacks at scale.
